name: Kids Puzzle Car & Vehicles Jigsaw
description:
If your pre-school kids like jigsaw puzzles, they will love Kids Toys - Wooden Jigsaw Puzzle too!

It's no secret that all children love to play with different toys/vehicles like cars, train, aeroplane, motor-bike, boat, ship, tank. We came up with super wooden puzzle jigsaw on toys theme.

Designed for ages between 2-9 years. It contains a collection of beautiful colorful vehicles jigsaw suitable for toddlers and kids. Kids enjoy solving the jigsaw wooden puzzle and are delighted by the cute vehicles images. At the same time Baby will learn and improve their observation and cognition skill.

It’s a fun and educational learning wooden vehicles game for preschool children, babies, toddlers including those with autism.

Features of Vehicles Puzzles for Toddlers!

Available many kind of vehicles to learn: cars, train, bike, ship, tank, aeroplane, boat
Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface
Universal app for all phones and tablets
Easy navigation between wooden super puzzles
High-quality graphics
Sweet background music
Drag & drop animations
Balloon animation & happy baby cheering after completing each level correctly by drag and drop

Check our other apps for more themes like ‘Fruits’, ‘Cartoons’, ‘Animals’, ‘Counting’, ‘ABC’, ’Shapes’

For more fun check out our other cool, fun and educational kids games for babies, toddlers, boys and girls! We create with love & care. Our free games are aimed at all-round development of your baby, revealing their inner potential. Also helps children spend time in interested, fascinating, fun and happy way, will give a wonderful mood.

We are working on creating more educational fun free games for your baby toddlers. Kindly share your feedback on contact@skycap.co.in we would love to hear what more you need for your toddlers & babies.
